citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
**At the time of the inspection conducted on 05/24/23, the licensee was unable to locate the current written Program of
Veterinary Care. The written Program of Veterinary available at the time of the inspection had last been reviewed by the
attending veterinarian in December 2021. The written Program of Veterinary Care indicated the review would be
conducted every 6 months. A current written Program of Veterinary Care should be reviewed by the attending
veterinarian on a regular basis to ensure the health and well being of the animals housed at that facility. The written
Program of Veterinary Care is required whenever a part-time veterinarian is employed by a facility as per Section 2.40 (a)
(1).
Documents that are required to be maintained by a facility per the AWA Regulations should be available for review at the
time of inspection in order to determine compliance with the Animal Welfare Act.
Correct by: June 2, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
**At the time of the inspection conducted on 05/24/23, the licensee was unable to locate the current written Program of 
Veterinary Care.  The written Program of Veterinary available at the time of the inspection had last been reviewed by the 
attending veterinarian in December 2021.  The written Program of Veterinary Care indicated the review would be 
conducted every 6 months.  A current written Program of Veterinary Care should be reviewed by the attending 
veterinarian on a regular basis to ensure the health and well being of the animals housed at that facility.  The written 
Program of Veterinary Care is required whenever a part-time veterinarian is employed by a facility as per Section 2.40 (a) 
(1).  
Documents that are required to be maintained by a facility per the AWA Regulations should be available for review at the 
time of inspection in order to determine compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. 
Correct by: June 2, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
